title: Why? Ombra vs Thin...
content:
Hi,  
I have a problem.  
I created a font with Fontlab Studio 5.

I have this cases:

Thin  
Light  
Regular  
Bold  
Black

Ombra

On Mac all cases work fine.  
On Pc, I open Thin, system open Ombra...  
In Illustrator Thin doesn’t appear...  
Why???

The fonts are .ttf.

Thank you!
author: diorg_font

comments.content: This might be because you have conflicting postscript names. (See just below where you name your font, under “font info”!)

Thanks frode frank!

I checked under “font info”:

Thin: I have PS font name like font\_name-Thin.  
Ombra: I have PS font name like font\_name-Ombra.

Is it possible that the problem dipends by the fact that I create Ombra case by Thin case???

Thank you!  
S

Clear your Adobe font cache then check the ’Preferred’ font names you have given the fonts. Adobe apps will use ’Preferred’ names if they are in the font.

M
